en.title: Software Engineer
en.text: Developed React Native mobile applications (Order to Cash, Inventory, Performance Management), optimized SQL Server stored procedures, and supported frontend development tasks while maintaining code quality.

es.title: Ingeniero de Software
es.text: Desarrollé aplicaciones móviles con React Native, optimicé procedimientos almacenados en SQL Server y apoyé tareas de frontend manteniendo la calidad del código.

fr.title: Ingénieur Logiciel
fr.text: Développement d’applications mobiles avec React Native, optimisation des procédures SQL Server et support des tâches frontend tout en maintenant la qualité du code.

ko.title: 소프트웨어 엔지니어
ko.text: React Native로 모바일 애플리케이션을 개발하고 SQL Server 저장 프로시저를 최적화하며 프론트엔드 작업을 지원했습니다.

en.title: Senior Software Engineer
en.text: Led modernization projects migrating ERP from WinForms to React, implemented Micro-Frontend architecture, established CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps, and developed C#/.NET microservices APIs.

es.title: Ingeniero de Software Senior
es.text: Lideré proyectos de modernización migrando ERP de WinForms a React, implementé arquitectura de micro-frontends y establecí pipelines CI/CD en Azure DevOps.

fr.title: Ingénieur Logiciel Senior
fr.text: Direction de projets de modernisation ERP, migration de WinForms vers React, mise en place d’architecture micro-frontend et pipelines CI/CD.

ko.title: 수석 소프트웨어 엔지니어
ko.text: ERP를 WinForms에서 React로 마이그레이션하는 현대화 프로젝트를 주도하고, 마이크로 프론트엔드 아키텍처를 구현하며 Azure DevOps에서 CI/CD 파이프라인을 구축했습니다.

en.title: Software Engineer
en.text: Developed and maintained medical and pharmacy systems, focusing on secure patient data handling, prescription management, and integration with healthcare workflows. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with industry standards and improve system reliability.

es.title: Ingeniero de Software
es.text: Desarrollé y mantuve sistemas médicos y de farmacia, garantizando la seguridad de datos de pacientes y la integración con flujos de trabajo de salud.

fr.title: Ingénieur Logiciel
fr.text: Développement et maintenance de systèmes médicaux et pharmaceutiques, gestion sécurisée des données patients et intégration aux processus de santé.

ko.title: 소프트웨어 엔지니어
ko.text: 의료 및 약국 시스템을 개발 및 유지 관리하며, 환자 데이터 보안과 처방 관리, 의료 워크플로우 통합을 담당했습니다.

en.title: Software Engineer
en.text: Worked on a money remittance application, designing and implementing secure transaction workflows, integrating with financial APIs, and optimizing backend services for high-volume transfers. Ensured compliance with financial regulations and improved system reliability for international remittance operations.

es.title: Ingeniero de Software
es.text: Trabajé en una aplicación de remesas de dinero, diseñando flujos de transacciones seguras e integrando APIs financieras para mejorar la confiabilidad del sistema.

fr.title: Ingénieur Logiciel
fr.text: Participation au développement d’une application de transfert d’argent, conception de flux sécurisés et intégration d’API financières pour assurer la conformité et la fiabilité.

ko.title: 소프트웨어 엔지니어
ko.text: 송금 애플리케이션을 개발하며 안전한 거래 워크플로우를 설계하고 금융 API를 통합하여 국제 송금 시스템의 안정성을 향상시켰습니다.
